title: new​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> signal.new() → signal Create a new signal

title: Fire​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> signal:Fire( ...: any-- Parameters that will be sent to the signal ) → () Fire an event to a signal

title: Connect​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> signal:Connect( CallbackEvent: function-- The event that will be called when the signal is fired ) → () Connect to the signal to get callbacks

title: Destroy​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> signal:Destroy() → () Destroy the signal
